home.title: Wihngo
home.tagline: Helping birds feel safe, fed, and loved.
home.description: Join a community built on sympathy, care, and shared joy for birds. Every bit of support helps a bird feel welcome in this world.

about.title: About Wihngo
about.subtitle: Built with love for birds and their humans
about.missionContent: Wihngo is a love-centric community for people who care about birds. We encourage people to care for and nurture birds, providing them with proper food, clean environments, and the love they deserve. We believe that every bird matters and that the bond between humans and birds is precious.
about.value1Content: Everything we do is driven by genuine love for birds and the people who care for them.
about.value2Content: We believe in complete openness about how we operate and how support reaches the birds.
about.value3Content: We bring together bird lovers to share stories, support each other, and celebrate the joy birds bring.
about.value4Content: We promote proper care practices including nutrition, hygiene, and health for all birds.
about.visionContent: We envision a world where every bird is treated with dignity, lives in a clean environment, enjoys proper nutrition, and feels loved.

principles.title: Our Principles
principles.subtitle: Wihngo is built on values that put birds and their caretakers first.
principles.allBirdsEqualDesc: No bird can be promoted, boosted, or prioritized by money. Every bird deserves the same chance to be seen, cared for, and supported.
principles.birdMoneySacredDesc: 100% of what you give to a bird goes directly to their care. Wihngo never takes a cut from bird support.
principles.careOverGrowthDesc: We design for calm, warm, human experiences—never aggressive or pressuring.
principles.emotionalSafetyDesc: We avoid guilt, loss framing, or pressure. Every interaction should feel kind.
principles.transparencyDesc: We're open about how things work, without being defensive. You deserve to know.
principles.microSupportDesc: $1 is meaningful. We celebrate small acts of support because they add up to real care.
principles.sustainabilityDesc: Optional Wihngo support helps us keep running. It's honest, minimal, and always on top—never taken from bird money.
principles.notCharity: We're not a charity—we're a for-profit platform. But we believe profit and ethics aren't opposites. We can build something sustainable that genuinely serves the community.

initiatives.title: Initiatives
initiatives.subtitle: Real solutions for better bird life. Ideas that become experiments that become impact.
initiatives.exampleBadge: Example initiative — for demonstration and discussion
initiatives.aboutExamplesDesc: These are for demonstration and discussion. They represent the kind of work Wihngo aims to do. Real initiatives will be clearly marked when they begin.
initiatives.visionNote: Initiatives turn ideas into action. Every project is transparent, documented, and built with bird welfare as the only priority.
initiatives.noActive: No active initiatives at the moment.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Hub
knowledge.subtitle: Trusted reference for bird care. We prefer accuracy and care over speed.
knowledge.beingPreparedNote: Our guides are being carefully prepared by people who care about getting it right. We prioritize accuracy over speed.
knowledge.guideBeingPrepared: This guide is being carefully prepared
knowledge.guideBeingPreparedDesc: We prefer accuracy and care over speed. This guide will be available once it has been properly researched and reviewed.
knowledge.speciesBeingPrepared: This profile is being carefully prepared
knowledge.speciesBeingPreparedDesc: We're researching diet, habitat, common risks, and care tips for this species. The profile will be available once properly reviewed.
knowledge.mythsSubtitle: Well-meaning advice that can actually harm birds. Learn what not to do.
knowledge.detailedExplanationsDesc: We're carefully researching each myth to provide accurate, helpful corrections. Quality matters more than speed.
knowledge.cleanWaterEssential: Clean water is essential for all birds
knowledge.smallActsMatter: Small acts of care make a real difference
